headline: BD to Present at Barclays 28th Annual Global Healthcare Conference
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that it will present at the Barclays 28th Annual Global Healthcare Conference on Tuesday, March 10, 2026 at 8:30 am Eastern Time.

headline: BD Expands Testing Capabilities to Help Clinicians Improve Diagnostic Accuracy and Efficiency
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced the launch of the BD Vacutainer速 Urine Complete Cup Kit, a three-tube collection system that expands and supports broader testing capabilities from a single urine specimen.
